You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesZ Z] > &zeta;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Zeta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0396/index.htm U+00396].
  * `&zeta;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03b6/index.htm U+003B6].
